title: Smart Herald Service
subtitle: Open your company to mobile communication

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text:
Smart Herald sends messages on phones, tablets and computers. This is a service open to all companies and associations.

As a company, you get powerful tools to manage your content and your users.

Your customers choose to download applications, so they choose to receive your news.
